title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Index Surges 6.2% as All Assets Trade Higher
summary: Sui (SUI) jumped 16.4% and Bitcoin Cash (BCH) gained 15.6%, leading the index higher.
author: CoinDesk Indices
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2869.91, up 6.2% (+166.74) since 4 p.m. ET on Wednesday.

All 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: SUI (+16.4%) and BCH (+15.6%)

Laggards: BTC (+3.3%) and LTC (+4.5%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index surged 6.2% with all 20 assets trading higher, led by SUI (+16.4%) and BCH (+15.6%).
